Author: Brief_Somewhere
Text: I guess I said something when I got home and sat down inside the doorway like "You didnt even wait for me"  and he might have said "I came home to wait for you here?"   and then drunk me was too tired to stay awake.  Im probably  gonna have to stop the drinking though.

Author: oh-em-jizzles
Text: >As usual. The group left me behind. Bf included.  u deserve better than that ! fuck those bitches. i totally get where ur coming from where u feel alone and like no one actually cares. usually it's exaggerated but this specific example is like.. overtly bad. have u talked to your bf about this?
